summary: Enhanced NFL and NCAA prediction agents with realistic Elo ratings, team strength modifiers, momentum tracking, advanced matchup analysis, and expert-style explanations. Predictions now range from 48-85% (vs previous 55-58%), with proper variance between strong favorites and close matchups.
enhancements: Team strength modifiers (offensive/defensive rankings, recent form)
Momentum adjustment algorithm (+/-10-12% based on wins in last 5 games)
Matchup analysis (offense vs defense strength modeling)
Enhanced expert-style explanations with confidence levels
Proper prediction variance (strong favorites 65-75%, close matchups 52-58%, division rivals compressed)
